text: "Maybe, I said." But we've got to remember that girl all the time, Dan. I feel kind of responsible for her." "Of course," he said, giving me one of his strange looks. Then after all it's them we're supposed to be working for, as well as the townsfolk and the agency detective."
handwritten_text: "Maybe, I said." But we've got to remember that girl all the time, Dan. I feel kind of responsible for her." "Of course," he said, giving me one of his strange looks. Then after all it's them we're supposed to be working for, as well as the townsfolk and the agency detective."
